name: Overheated Laser Post LD51
description:
Try to survive your way through the wormhole.

Explode ALL mines and get rid of ALL the asteroids with one shot.

You only get one shot for level (every 10 seconds).

Some mines do not explode in all directions.

- Use your MOUSE to select the mine to shoot. 

- Click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to explode mines.

Improvements over original version:

- Backgroud music added.

- Show next level right after completing previous one.

- Change crosshair to red when laser cannot be fired.

- Move cannon towards selected mine when shooting.

- Reduce worm-hole speed rotation.
